# Document Storage
### Reference: 
cb-393-34075838

### Amendment: 
4 (Released on 2023-12-14)

### Solicitation Number: 
50100-22-4011502

### Posting Date: 
29 November 2023

### Closing Date/Time: 
14 December 2023 15:00:00

### Start Date: 
01 January 2024

### End Date: 
31 December 2026

### Category: 
 Service

### Type: 
 Advance Contract Award Notice

### Method of Procurement: 
 Competitive Contracting

### Trade Agreements: 
The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Procedure: 
Pre-Qualification: Not Applicable 

### Service Description: 
This contract is for the provision of document storage services. The successful bidder must be able to provide a secure and climate controlled warehouse environment to store various types of documents. The services to be provided include:

- Receiving, recording, and storing documents and materials
- Providing secure retrieval and delivery services for the stored materials
- Providing various service channels for requesting the services, such as a secure online system, telephone with 800 service and facsimile. 

### Regions of Opportunity: 
The contract will be performed in the region of Saskatoon.

### Regions of Delivery: 
The contract will be performed in the region of Saskatoon.

### Contact:
If you are interested in receiving further information or responding to the request for service, please contact Laurel Barrett by phone at 306-659-9300, email at [501Contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:501Contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca) or by regular mail at Correctional Services of Canada, 3427 Faithfull Avenue, Saskatoon, SK S7K 3X5.
